We thank you for your visit to www.gmciltd.com . The website www.gmciltd.com is owned by GMCI Pvt. Ltd. having its registered office in Gujarat incorporated under the companies Act, 2013 and Company Register under the number U24290GJ2019PTC108256

Links to and usage of the www.gmciltd.com website was subject to the following terms. The act of accessing and exploring the platform shall constitute recognition without reserve of the specified conditions.

Site Content

The website www.gmciltd.com is not an e-commerce platform. Nothing on this website may be viewed as an invitation or solicitation of any bid to buy, sell or participate in any quoted or unquoted securities released by (GMCI) or its subsidiaries. The goods, procedures and systems listed on the www.gmciltd.com website. Not always available in all countries. As a consequence, the operator of this website agrees to practice his own responsibility in accessing this content.

The material on the www.gmciltd.com website is offered by (GMCI) for knowledge purposes only. (GMCI) is guided solely by the best-in-class duty to provide guests with details on its website www.gmciltd.com.

While every attempt has been taken to ensure the authenticity of the information on this website, (GMCI) is also not responsible for any mistakes, omissions or consequences that might arise from the usage of this material. In particular, hyperlinks to our site that direct users to information stored on other sites over which (GMCI) has little influence.

SITE TECHNICAL OPERATION- NO WARRANTY

The website www.gmciltd.com is usually open 24 hours a day and 7 days a week. In the event of circumstances outside (GMCI) control, difficulties associated with information systems, difficulties associated with telecommunications networks, certain technological problems or maintenance-this idea is not new-(GMCI) may intend to disable or disable access to all or part of the web.

The customer specifically agrees that he / she has the requisite skills and means to access and utilize the www.gmciltd.comwebsite. The customer agrees that he / she has verified that the device software he / she requires is safe from viruses and is in good working condition.

(GMCI) can in no manner be found responsible for any actual, unintentional or unique harm arising from the usage of the www.gmciltd.com website or any places related to it and, in particular, for any financial injury, loss of revenue, failure of services or data in the computer system of the customer.

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS

The basic layout and applications, documents, photos, sounds, illustrations, databases and, more broadly, all other elements of the www.gmciltd.com website are the property of (GMCI) and are covered by the Intellectual Property Rights of India.

Trademarks, logos, patterns, drawings which appear on the www.gmciltd.com website are the property of (GMCI) or a third party where (GMCI) has acquired the permission to use these trademarks, logos, patterns, drawings.

PERSONAL DATA

The consumer is therefore forbidden from accessing data on the www.gmciltd.com website through any method that may alter or be likely to change the quality or nature of the data, display, organisation or functions on the www.gmciltd.comwebsite.(GMCI) shall use all means possible to protect and maintain the security of the personal data gathered on the website. The consumer has the privilege to access to details about him / her and can have it changed or adjusted. If he / she intends to correct or erase such details, he / she can write to (GMCI) and send an e-mail to: info@gmciltd.com

PHOTO CREDITS

Istock, Getty image, Unsplash and factory

For more information, contact the webmaster at the following address: info@gmciltd.com

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
